titles: Warlike directions, or, The sovldiers practice set forth for the benefit of all such as are, or will be, scholars of martiall discipline, but especially for all such officers as are not yet setled or rightly grounded in the arte of warre, by a practitioner in the same art, T.F.
author: Fisher, Thomas, 17th cent.
notes: Written by Thomas Fisher.  Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
keywords: Military art and science --  Early works to 1800.
